sentences.sentence: I'd never seen a clumsier, less coordinated boxer.
sentences.translation: 我还从未见过更加笨拙、更不协调的拳击手。

sentences.sentence: Toads have shorter legs and are generally clumsier than frogs.
sentences.translation: 蟾蜍的腿比青蛙短，而且通常比青蛙丑。

sentences.sentence: Some American kids sneered at me when I spoke. I was embarrassed, and this made my speaking even clumsier.
sentences.translation: 正因此，一些美国孩子总在我讲话的时候讥笑我，我很是尴尬，然后话就更说不溜了。
